ComicInfo.Series: The Other History of the DC Universe
ComicInfo.Summary: Book Five 1981-2010: Anissa Pierce: Anissa Pierce tells her story of her struggles growing up the daughter of a super-hero who gains her own meta powers, also a black woman who was gay. When she decided to become a super-hero, she faced resistance from her parents, especially her father Black Lightning. She went on the join the Outsiders, where she eventually found herself in a relationship with her true love, Grace Choi.
